contents:
Welcome to Pincong. Hope you will find what you look for.
Pincong normally does not encourage users to use languages other than Mandarin. In your case, I suggest posting in both English (for precise and accurate expression) and Mandarin (less language barrier for others), possibly with the aid of Google Translate.
If you have reservation against your Mandarin input app/software, I personally recommend Google pinyin or Microsoft Chinese Input.
